doc.name: Simulator
doc.description: Actor that calls a simulation program of a dynamic system that is coupled to Ptolemy II. At the start of the simulation, this actor fires a system command that is defined by the parameter programName with arguments programArguments. It then initiates a socket connection and uses the socket to exchange data with the external simulation program each time the actor is fired.
doc.author: Michael Wetter
doc.property: Arguments of program that starts the simulation.
Name of program that starts the simulation.
Port number for BSD socket (used if non-negative).
File name to which this actor writes the simulation log.
File name to which this actor writes the socket configuration.
If true (the default), a window will be created that shows the console output.
If true, attempts to sychronize timing with the client.
